message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take 60 and you get 40. A fair offer to start, don't you think?
I'm taking a chance here, Alice. 60 for me and 40 for you.  If you don't accept this, we both know things will get worse for us in the next round.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise. 55 for me, 45 for you. We're losing money with every round!
